import CardCovidStatus from "../CardCovidStatus/CardCovidStatus" import AboutContentStyled from "./AboutContentStyled" import CommonUtils from "../../utils/common_utils" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" function AboutContent(props){ const listCovidStatus = useSelector(store => store.covidStatus.covidStatus); // console.log(listCovidStatus); return(

Makan

{CommonUtils.formatNumber(props.jumlah)}

COVID APP

Data Covid Berdasarkan

 ) } export default AboutContent
